Daily Wellness Pulse

• Single-file Python 3 script (standard library only)
• Console-based health tracking app for daily mood, energy, water intake, and sleep logging
• Core features:
  - Log daily wellness entry: mood (1-10), energy level (1-10), water cups (0-20), sleep hours (0-24)
  - View summary stats for current week (average mood, total water, average sleep)
  - Persist all data to a local JSON file in the script's directory
  - Generate a shareable text summary (copy-paste format) with weekly trends
  - Simple menu-driven interface with input validation
• Data storage:
  - JSON file stores entries as date-keyed records with mood, energy, water, sleep values
  - Automatically load previous entries on startup
• Keyboard navigation: number/letter selection for menu options, clear prompts for each input
• Output: Display weekly averages, streak counter (consecutive days logged), and wellness score (0-100 based on targets)
• No external dependencies; runs on Python 3.8+
